## SummonerSpell.rawTooltip property

The raw tooltip of this summoner spell. This contains some HTML-like tags to help view this better on webpages.

Even though, these are supposed to be more detailed than the [SummonerSpell.description](./shieldbow.summonerspell.description.md)<!-- -->. It is not recommended using either this OR [SummonerSpell.tooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.tooltip.md)<!-- -->. This is because they contain placeholders without values to fill them with. Use [SummonerSpell.description](./shieldbow.summonerspell.description.md) instead.

See [tooltip](./shieldbow.summonerspell.tooltip.md) to view this with the HTML-like tags stripped out.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly rawTooltip: string;
```
